name: Alchemical Defense
description:
Defend your home!

You live in a humble abode where things have gone massively wrong thanks to your alchemy experiments. Set down your elemental turrets and protect yourself against the ever-increasing hordes of faceless enemies that I didn't have time to flesh out who they were! How many waves can you last before you succumb to the faceless enemy?

Turrets

Fire Turret - High fire rate, good damage, no special effects.

Air Turret - Low fire rate, low damage, reverses enemies

Water Turret - High fire rate, low damage, slows enemies

Ground Turret - Extremely low fire rate, high damage, instantly destroys enemies

Controls

Most everything is controllable with the mouse - except if you want to cancel placing a building, hit the escape key. That's all!
